    • shootAt

      public Square.Damage shootAt(Coordinate position)
      Shoots at a given position of opponentÂ´s board. If it hits any ship the method returns SEVERE_DAMAGE if it is not sunk or MASSIVE_DAMAGE if it is sunk. If it does not hit any ship it returns MISSED_SHOT
      Parameters:

      Returns:
